snippet.title: Orcs Must Die! 3 - Cold As Eyes DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Bundle up, War Mage! The Order needs your help to defend frozen lands. The Cold as Eyes DLC for Orcs Must Die! 3 is available on Steam, Xbox One, PlayStation 4, and Google Stadia!

FEATURING
All-new Cyclopean enemies
Three new ice-themed maps
Flamethrower weapon
Cyclopean Gaze trinket
Molten Gold trap

◄ Join the Orcs Must Die! Community ►
    • Discord       https://discord.gg/B64RVmM
    • Facebook   http://www.facebook.com/OMDGame
    • Twitter        http://www.twitter.com/OrcsMustDie
